critique: The document focuses on safeguarding classified national security information shared with state, local, tribal, and private sector entities. It establishes a program to govern access to this information, ensuring security standards are applied. The order emphasizes federal control over the information and sets guidelines for access eligibility, facility security, and information system security. It also establishes an advisory committee to address policy issues and recommends changes to policies and procedures. The document prioritizes national security and the proper handling of classified information.
